{"id":665843459,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1648055357,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/665843459/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"5.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    int findsquare(int n)\n    {\n        int sum=0,temp;\n        while(n)\n        {\n            temp=n%10;\n            sum+=temp*temp;\n            n/=10;\n        }\n        return sum;\n    }\n    \n    bool isHappy(int n) {\n        int slow,fast;\n        slow=fast=n;\n        do\n        {\n            slow=findsquare(slow);\n            fast=findsquare(fast);\n            fast=findsquare(fast);\n                \n        }while(slow!=fast);\n            \n        if(slow==1)\n            return 1;\n        else\n            return 0;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
